blume

Class BlumeColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • blume.BlumeColor

  • public class BlumeColor
extends java.lang.Object
    Color object used by Blume for ANSI-based 8- and 24-bit coloring.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BlumeColor()
      Default constructor which produces black (BlumeText.Black) from the system's 8-bit color palette.
      BlumeColor(int colorValue)
      Constructor for an 8-bit color palette option (0 - 255).
      BlumeColor(int red, int green, int blue)
      Constructor for a 24-bit RGB color option.

    • Method Summary

      Sets this object's green value.

      Sets this object's color type as 24-bit.
      void setIs8Bit()
      Sets this object's color type as 8-bit.
      void setRed(int _red)
      Sets this object's red value.

      • BlumeColor

        public BlumeColor(int red,
                  int green,
                  int blue)
        Constructor for a 24-bit RGB color option. 24-bit (true color) is comprised of three color channels (red, green, blue) with values 0 to 255 each.
        Parameters:
        red -
        green -
        blue -
